subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Nik Stauskas found a comfortable spot in the left corner and made 6 of 6 3-point shots, helping Michigan shut down Florida and roll to a berth in the Final Four.
snippet: Nik Stauskas found a comfortable spot in the left corner and made 6 of 6 3-point shots, helping Michigan shut down Florida and roll to a berth in the Final Four.
